name: py-pymatgen

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Python Materials Genomics is a robust materials analysis code that
defines core object representations for structures and molecules with
support for many electronic structure codes. It is currently the core
analysis code powering the Materials Project.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-ruamel-yaml
dependencies.description:
a YAML parser/emitter that supports roundtrip preservation of comments,
seq/map flow style, and map key order

dependencies.name: py-monty
dependencies.description: Monty is the missing complement to Python.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description:
SciPy (pronounced "Sigh Pie") is a Scientific Library for Python. It
provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as
routines for numerical integration and optimization.

dependencies.name: py-tabulate
dependencies.description: Pretty-print tabular data

dependencies.name: py-spglib
dependencies.description:
Python bindings for C library for finding and handling crystal
symmetries.

dependencies.name: py-networkx
dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.name: py-palettable
dependencies.description: Color palettes for Python.

dependencies.name: py-sympy
dependencies.description: SymPy is a Python library for symbolic mathematics.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-plotly
dependencies.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python

dependencies.name: py-uncertainties
dependencies.description:
Transparent calculations with uncertainties on the quantities involved
(aka error propagation); fast calculation of derivatives

dependencies.name: py-pybtex
dependencies.description: Pybtex is a BibTeX-compatible bibliography processor written in Python.

dependencies.name: py-tqdm
dependencies.description: A Fast, Extensible Progress Meter

dependent_to.name: py-matminer
dependent_to.description:
Matminer is a library for performing data mining in the field of
materials science.

dependent_to.name: py-ocp-models
dependent_to.description:
Reference implementation for the MLPerf HPC OpenCatalyst DimeNet++
benchmark

dependent_to.name: py-abipy
dependent_to.description: Python package to automate ABINIT calculations and analyze the results.

dependent_to.name: py-robocrys
dependent_to.description:
Robocrystallographer is a tool to generate text descriptions of crystal
structures. Similar to how a real-life crystallographer would analyse a
structure, robocrystallographer looks at the symmetry, local
environment, and extended connectivity when generating a description.
The package includes utilities for identifying molecule names, component
orientations, heterostructure information, and more.
